testcase.name: Successful Login
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I enter valid username and password....................................passed And I click on the login button.............................................passed Then I should be redirected to the home page................................passed

testcase.name: Test the tip calculation with valid inputs
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the tip calculator page.................................passed When I enter "1000" as the bill amount......................................passed And I enter "15" as the tip percentage......................................passed And I click the calculate button............................................passed Then I should see the tip amount as "150.00"................................passed And I should see the total amount as "1150.00"..............................passed
